about_the_game:
"Chakana" invites players on an epic journey through the depths of Andean Mythology with our platform/metroidvania game, seamlessly blending exploration, combat, and discovery. Each level unfurls a new tapestry of challenges, adversaries, and concealed secrets waiting to be uncovered. Gather valuable items to refine your skills and unlock the enigmas of uncharted territories as you advance through this enthralling adventure. Immerse yourself now and delve into the wonders of this rich and enchanting world!



Dive deep into the captivating world of Chakana, where a realm in peril awaits, offering a vivid exploration of the myths and legends of Andean Mythology. Traverse from enigmatic temples to the sprawling jungles of the Amazon, where every scene brims with intricate details and evocative references, guiding you through an enthralling journey of discovery and wonder.



In the game, you assume the role of Hoyustus, the jaguar warrior, on a mission to free his people from the tyranny of a usurping god within the mystical world of Chakana. Explore his distinct abilities, including his deadly spear and condor wings enabling access to inaccessible areas. Progress through diverse jungle settings, temples, and ancient ruins to uncover new techniques and unlock special powers, immersing yourself in a captivating adventure of discovery and heroism.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with at least 1 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Embark on a 2D metroidvania adventure that immerses players in Andean mythology, focusing on exploration, combat, and discovery. Join Hoyustus, a brave jaguar warrior, on his journey to free his people from the oppression of an usurping god.
